item.name: Miregas
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}, and must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} creature is confused, as if by the {@spell confusion} spell. After three successful saves, the poison ends.

item.name: Minstrel's Bane
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 6 ({@dice 1d12}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. The {@condition poisoned} creature can't speak or understand any of its known languages aside from telepathy. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

item.name: Blightful Unction
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature is vulnerable to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. The creature can repeat the saving throw whenever they take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Cat's Kiss
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} creature can't breathe, and is at risk of suffocating. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Huelith's Burden
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and falls {@condition prone} at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Want of Spirit
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. The {@condition poisoned} creature regards all other creatures as hostile. Additionally, the first time the {@condition poisoned} creature is damaged by another creature, it must succeed a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The DC equals 10 or half the damage it takes, whichever number is higher. As an action, the creature can make a DC 13 Wisdom check to steel its resolve and end the {@condition frightened} condition on itself.

item.name: Damning Vigil
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} creature is incapable of falling asleep by natural means. The {@condition poisoned} creature must repeat the saving throw every 24 hours, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Nervosity
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 13 ({@dice 2d12}) poison damage and becomes {@condition poisoned}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} creature is automatically surprised at the start of any combat encounter, and attacks of opportunity against them have advantage. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of a long rest, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Gluttony
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 2d6} days. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature gains no nutritional value from food, and will eventually regurgitate their meal. The creature can repeat the saving throw whenever they finish a long rest.

item.name: Muddling Toxin
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Whenever the {@condition poisoned} creature makes a saving throw, it must roll a {@dice d6} and subtract the number rolled from the saving throw's result. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Maddening Sting
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On each of its turns, the {@condition poisoned} creature uses its action to make a single melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach. If there is no creature within its reach, the creature does nothing this turn. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Spellsbane
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}, and must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On each successive failed save, the creature breaks concentration. After three successful saves, the poison ends.

item.name: Ferphotis Spores
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While poisoned, the creature must roll a {@dice 1d6} at the start of each of their turns. On a result of 1, the creature spends its turn retching and heaving. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Water of Clangor
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Also on a failure, the creature completely loses their ability to smell for 1 hour.
Goblinoids are immune to this poison.

item.name: Simple Tranquilizer
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. While poisoned, the creature is {@condition unconscious}. The creature wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

item.name: Inukaolo Poison
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that are size small or tiny have disadvantage on the saving throw.

item.name: Abyssal Tonic
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 13 ({@dice 2d12}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 1d4} hours. While poisoned, the creature can't see more than 10 feet in front if it. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't poisoned.

item.name: Taphephobia
entries: A creature subjected to this obvious poison must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 8 hours. While poisoned, the creature is {@condition unconscious} and appears dead to all outward inspection.

item.name: Apothecary's Padlock
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. While poisoned, the creature can't add their proficiency bonus to any ability checks or attack rolls that use the creature's Dexterity score.

item.name: Peelimav's Medicine
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned}, the creature deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use strength. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also takes 1 point of {@condition exhaustion|phb}. The creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

item.name: Gorgon's Clasp
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 2d4} hours. While poisoned, the creature's hand muscles contract and are unable to relax. The creature can't release their grip of any objects they are holding, and gains no benefit from short rests. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each hour, ending the effect on itself on a success.

As an action, another creature may attempt a Strength check to momentarily release the grip of a {@condition poisoned} creature. The DC for this check equals the Strength score of the {@condition poisoned} creature.

item.name: Tincture of the Whispered One
entries: A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. After the {@condition poisoned} creature casts a spell, they must roll a {@dice d6}. On a result of 1-5 the creature can't cast that spell again until they finish a long rest.
